entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
